project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement input functionality to accept temperature and output unit
Implement temperature conversion functions for Celsius to Fahrenheit, Celsius to Kelvin, Fahrenheit to Celsius, Fahrenheit to Kelvin, Kelvin to Celsius, and Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented conversion functions to ensure that they function correctly
